summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an individual to appear before a grand jury on July 24, 2019, to testify regarding alleged violations of federal sex trafficking and conspiracy statutes. The document includes an 'Advice of Rights' notice and a request to keep the subpoena confidential.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued the grand jury subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Patrick Lawton
persons.context: Appears as the addressee or a referenced party in the document's header or file metadata.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance
events.description: The subpoena commands the recipient to appear before a federal grand jury to testify regarding alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 1591, 2421, 2422, 2423, 371 (sex trafficking, transportation for prostitution, and conspiracy).

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: The grand jury subpoena was issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office, marking a formal step in the criminal investigation.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Manhattan, New York, NY
One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The subpoena is part of an official criminal investigation into suspected felonies, specifically violations of federal sex trafficking and related statutes (18 U.S.C. §§ 1591, 2421, 2422, 2423, 371).
The U.S. Attorney's Office requested the recipient voluntarily refrain from disclosing the subpoena's existence to preserve the investigation's confidentiality.
The document includes a formal 'Advice of Rights' notice, informing the recipient of their right against self-incrimination and to legal counsel.
The subpoena was issued on July 5, 2019, with the commanded appearance scheduled for July 24, 2019, at 10:00 a.m.
